Metaphor:EXCESS WEALTH IS DISGUSTING

From EN MetaNet Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Name Gloss EXCESS WEALTH IS DISGUSTING
Name Transcription
Aliases
Description
Comments An amount of financial resources which exceeds societal norm (value on scale) is disgusting.
Tags Program sources
Family Wealth metaphors
Metaphor Level Specific
Metaphor Type
Experiential Basis
Cultural Scope
Source Frame Disgusting
Roles:
Target Frame Wealth
Roles:wealth, wealthy_entity, degree of wealth
